allow: Bash(cmd /c "cd /d e:\\C-napse && git add -A && git status")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd ''e:\\C-napse''; cargo fmt --all; git add -A; git status")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location ''e:\\C-napse''; git commit -m ''Apply cargo fmt to fix code formatting

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location ''e:\\C-napse''; git add -A; git commit -m ''Fix fastembed/ort TLS feature requirement for CI

Add tls-rustls feature to ort dependency to fix download-binaries
compilation error in CI when using --all-features.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location ''e:\\C-napse''; git add -A; git commit -m ''Fix ort version to use prerelease 2.0.0-rc.11

The ort crate v2 is still in release candidate, so we need to
specify the exact prerelease version explicitly.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location ''e:\\C-napse''; git add -A; git commit -m ''Fix CI to not use --all-features due to fastembed/ort incompatibility

The embeddings feature uses fastembed which has complex ONNX runtime
dependencies that are not compatible when mixed with explicit ort
versions. Updated CI to use default features only, and upgraded
fastembed to v4 which has better ort compatibility.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "Set-Location ''e:\\C-napse''; git commit -m ''Fix all clippy warnings and errors

- Fix unused variables by prefixing with underscore
- Add ExposeSecret import to credentials test module
- Remove unused mut in openrouter
- Add #[allow\(dead_code\)] for placeholder structs/fields
- Use #[derive\(Default\)] instead of manual Default impls
- Change &PathBuf to &Path in function signatures
- Use .next_back\(\) instead of .last\(\) for DoubleEndedIterator
- Use .copied\(\) instead of .map\(|s| *s\) for map_clone
- Remove .into\(\) for useless conversions
- Remove wildcard in or patterns
- Use .map\(\) instead of .and_then\(|x| Some\(y\)\)
- Derive Default for ToolExecutor

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>''")

Bash(git -C "e:/C-napse" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: auto-release on every push to main

- Release workflow now triggers on main branch pushes
- Creates/updates a "latest" release with pre-built binaries
- Add install.sh for macOS/Linux users
- Binaries available immediately after CI passes

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "e:/C-napse" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: install command box layout

- Use nowrap to keep command on single line
- Add horizontal scroll for overflow
- Center copy button vertically
- Add padding-right to prevent overlap with button

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "e:/C-napse" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix type mismatch: convert Option<&str> to Option<String>

The screen_context from get_current_description\(\) returns Option<&str>
but process_in_background\(\) expects Option<String>. Added .map\(|s| s.to_string\(\)\)
to properly convert the type.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
